data.text:
Now, coming around the final corner into the final straight! 
Cheval Grand is closing in! Can she make it? Can she make it?!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
󠁿Now, coming around the final corner into the final straight! 
󠁿Cheval Grand is closing in! Can she make it? Can she make it?!

data.text: Eh... hah... hah... hah...! Ah... ahh... hah...
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿Eh... hah... hah... hah...! Ah... ahh... hah...

data.text: Tch, damn...
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿Tch, damn...

data.text:
One day, as the sun was setting over the fields 
I saw the figure of a horse girl training frantically.
data.processed:
󠁿One day, as the sun was setting over the fields 
󠁿I saw the figure of a horse girl training frantically.

data.text:
The other day during the mock race, Cheval Grand had a great start. 
But somehow finished in last place.
data.processed:
󠁿The other day during the mock race, Cheval Grand had a great start. 
󠁿But somehow finished in last place.

data.text:
Her start was great, she seemed to have good stamina 
a great sense of timing, and her form was impressive.
data.processed:
󠁿Her start was great, she seemed to have good stamina 
󠁿a great sense of timing, and her form was impressive.

data.text:
She may not have won that race, but with the right training 
I'm sure she can become a great horse girl.
data.processed:
󠁿She may not have won that race, but with the right training 
󠁿I'm sure she can become a great horse girl.

data.text:
Augh, hah, Hah Ha… h! 
Ahh haaah... Ah...
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿Augh, hah, Hah Ha… h! 
󠁿Ahh haaah... Ah...

data.text: Ahhhh!
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿Ahhhh!

data.text:
I was worried about how she was training, and if she was taking any breaks. 
Even though I considered it meddling, I decided to call out to her when the time was right.
data.processed:
󠁿I was worried about how she was training, and if she was taking any breaks. 
󠁿Even though I considered it meddling, I decided to call out to her when the time was right.

data.text:
-Gulp .....Ahh, .....haaahh. 
time to go home
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿-Gulp .....Ahh, .....haaahh. 
󠁿time to go home

data.text:
Huh!? 
Ah... Um... Me?
data.name: Cheval Grand

choices.text: Yeah, I was just a bit worried
Yeah, I was just a bit worried

data.processed:
󠁿Huh!? 
󠁿Ah... Um... Me?

data.text: 『Worried...?』
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿『Worried...?』

data.text:
Ah... its... sorry. its fine. 
I'm okay, so....
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿Ah... its... sorry. its fine. 
󠁿I'm okay, so....

data.text: ...Well then...
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿...Well then...

data.text: And then she left, just like that...
data.processed: 󠁿And then she left, just like that...

data.text: ...I really did that...
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿...I really did that...

data.text:
(The way I ran from that person yesterday, I know its not a big deal... 
He was just worried about me...)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿(The way I ran from that person yesterday, I know its not a big deal... 
󠁿He was just worried about me...)

data.text:
(...I mean, I worried a trainer I don't even know. 
I can't afford to keep worrying them.)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿(...I mean, I worried a trainer I don't even know. 
󠁿I can't afford to keep worrying them.)

data.text: Chevacchi Found～!
data.name: Vivlos
data.processed: 󠁿Chevacchi Found～!

data.text:
I see you're still going at your own pace. 
Tonight, we will be having a party at home, as Mom said.
data.name: Verxina
data.processed:
󠁿I see you're still going at your own pace. 
󠁿Tonight, we will be having a party at home, as Mom said.

data.text:
Everyone is waiting! Chevacchi, hurry up and change out of your uniform 
and the three of us can head over together!
data.name: Vivlos
data.processed:
󠁿Everyone is waiting! Chevacchi, hurry up and change out of your uniform 
󠁿and the three of us can head over together!

data.text:
...It'll be fine, even without me. As long as you two are there 
that's all that matters.
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿...It'll be fine, even without me. As long as you two are there 
󠁿that's all that matters.

data.text:
That's not true! If Chevacchi isn't there, everyone will be sad. 
I bet they'll all be happy to hear what's going on at school!
data.name: Verxina
data.processed:
󠁿That's not true! If Chevacchi isn't there, everyone will be sad. 
󠁿I bet they'll all be happy to hear what's going on at school!

data.text: (At school story…)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿(At school story…)

data.text:
(That could mean talking about racing, my dreams, or... 
I wonder if they'll ask me about...)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿(That could mean talking about racing, my dreams, or... 
󠁿I wonder if they'll ask me about...)

data.text: ......Ah, I'm fine. I won't go
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿......Ah, I'm fine. I won't go

data.text: Eh, why?
data.name: Vivlos
data.processed: 󠁿Eh, why?

data.text: I don't want to, that's why.
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿I don't want to, that's why.

data.text:
Boo... No Way! I don't want Chevacchi to not go! 
Big sis, please try to convince her.
data.name: Vivlos
data.processed:
󠁿Boo... No Way! I don't want Chevacchi to not go! 
󠁿Big sis, please try to convince her.

data.text:
Hmm... Well, 
everyone has days like this.
data.name: Verxina
data.processed:
󠁿Hmm... Well, 
󠁿everyone has days like this.

data.text: Ehh～!
data.name: Vivlos
data.processed: 󠁿Ehh～!

data.text:
I'll go tell everyone she's not going. 
Come on Vivlos, let's go before it ends.
data.name: Verxina
data.processed:
󠁿I'll go tell everyone she's not going. 
󠁿Come on Vivlos, let's go before it ends.

data.text: Boo… alright then i get it～
data.name: Vivlos
data.processed: 󠁿Boo… alright then i get it～

data.text:
....Haa, 
.....Sorry
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿....Haa, 
󠁿.....Sorry

data.text:
(Im sure they can both tell their school stories to everyone with a smile, 
which is something I can't do. If they ask me about my dreams... 
I won't be able to say anything.)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed:
󠁿(Im sure they can both tell their school stories to everyone with a smile, 
󠁿which is something I can't do. If they ask me about my dreams... 
󠁿I won't be able to say anything.)

data.text: Ah...!, I... I WANT TO BE LIKE HER...!
data.name: Young Cheval
data.processed: 󠁿Ah...!, I... I WANT TO BE LIKE HER...!

data.text:
I'll surpass every challenge 
I won't be discouraged by anything, just like her... 
I'll be the GREATEST HORSE GIRL!
data.name: Young Cheval
data.processed:
󠁿I'll surpass every challenge 
󠁿I won't be discouraged by anything, just like her... 
󠁿I'll be the GREATEST HORSE GIRL!

data.text: (I used to be so open, i could talk with my chest high. but now…)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿(I used to be so open, i could talk with my chest high. but now…)

data.text: (...I just... Can't be helped...)
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿(...I just... Can't be helped...)

data.text: ...I should head home soon.
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿...I should head home soon.

data.text: Ah...... But I don't want to go home.
data.name: Cheval Grand
data.processed: 󠁿Ah...... But I don't want to go home.
